objectDesc.p: Papyrus, 12.3x11.4, 54 extant leaf(s), 1 column(s), 26-28 line(s) per column, 37-41 characters per line, written in Greek/Latin.

additions.p: Also contains Cicero in Catilinam, Alcestis (in Latin) and some liturgical prayers and a word list (in Greek). A number of pages still need to be checked. Various parts of the text were published in numerous sources.

history.provenance: [1?] Obtained 1997 by Inv. 126-181, Fundación Sant Lluc Evangelista (Foundation of Saint Luke Evangelist) at Barcelona, España.
[1?] Transferred to Abadía de Monserrat (Abbey of Montserrat) at Barcelona, España.
[2?] Purchased 1955 by David M. Robinson at Al Qāhirah, Miṣr from Maguid Sameda.
[2?] Donated 1968 to P. Robinson Lat. 1, Duke University, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library at Durham, NC by William H. Willis.
[2?] Relabelled as P.Duk.inv. 798, Duke University, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library at Durham, NC.

msIdentifier.msName: [1?] P.Monts.Roca Inv. 126-178, 292, 338, Abadía de Monserrat (Abbey of Montserrat), Barcelona, España.
[2?] P.Duk.inv. 798, Duke University, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Durham, NC.

sourceDesc.bibl: [?] Zheltov, Michael, “The Anaphora and the Thanksgiving Prayer from the Barcelona Papyrus”, Vigiliae Christianae, vol. 62, no. 5, p. 467-504, Brill Academic Publishers: Leiden, Nederland, 2008. OCLC 50924640.
